class Solution {
public:
    int longestSubstring(string s, int k) {
        if(s=="")
            return 301;
        int n = s.size();
        if (n == 0)
            return 0;
        
        unordered_map<char, int> counter;
        for (auto letter : s)
            counter[letter]++;
        
        int var1, var2;
        bool flag = false;
        
        for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
            if (counter[s[i]] < k) {
                flag = true;
                var1 = longestSubstring(s.substr(0, i), k);
                var2 = longestSubstring(s.substr(i+1), k);
                break;
            }
            if (i == n-1)
                return n;
        }
        
        return max(var1, var2);
    }
};
